HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Harvest Organs Post Mortem mod had a major update. Now you are able to modify all of the mods settings from game settings menu.| Options include: - Harvest chances for both natural organs and bionics. - Age of the corpse at which it is still possible to harvest natural organs. - Scaling for pawns medical surgery success chance while performing autopsy. - !New! Maximal number of organs/bionics that can be harvested in a single operation.

Some requested features.| New features: - Bodies are retained after autopsy. - Animal autopsy was merged into the main mod. - Added corpse filter to recipes and stockpiles. Values from glitterworld recipes are used for filters. - Default butcher debuffs no longer apply. - Custom debuff for basic autopsy.

Due to a bug Basic Autopsy recipe was removed from the butchering table. Autopsy table is now unlocked after reaserching Basic Autopsy. If you have an ongoing game you will recieve one time error and you should manualy remove all Basic Autopsy bills from your butchering tables.
